# Update Octofit Tracker App Prompt

This prompt is for updating the Octofit Tracker App. Use agent mode and GPT-4.1 model for all actions and responses related to this workflow.

- All updates should follow the project structure and best practices.
- Ensure all changes are tracked and explained.
- Use the latest conventions for Django and React as appropriate.
- Always verify changes and test endpoints after updates.
